last_episode_to_air.name: Gutsy Women Are a Bunch of Mothers
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hillary and Chelsea get candid about their relationship while taking mother-daughter tango lessons with Goldie Hawn and Kate Hudson.

name: Gutsy
overview: Take an unforgettable journey with Hillary and Chelsea Clinton as they go on adventures with some of the world’s boldest and bravest women—from household names to unsung heroes—who make us laugh and inspire us to be more gutsy.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Have the Last Laugh
episodes.overview: Hillary and Chelsea explore the power of humor while bowling with Wanda Sykes, having tea with Amy Schumer, and enrolling in clown school.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Refuse Hate
episodes.overview: Megan Thee Stallion talks to Hillary and Chelsea about facing personal attacks. Hillary meets with moms who have lost children to violent crimes.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Seek Justice
episodes.overview: Kim Kardashian opens up about what inspired her legal advocacy work. Mariska Hargitay joins Hillary and Chelsea to share in the power of storytelling.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Are Rebel Hearts
episodes.overview: Alongside Gloria Steinem, Abby Wambach, and Glennon Doyle, Hillary and Chelsea discuss boldness and bravery in love.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Are Forces of Nature
episodes.overview: From hiking to surfing, Hillary and Chelsea take in the beauty of our planet—and talk with activists like Dr. Jane Goodall and Quannah Chasinghorse.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Step Up
episodes.overview: Hillary and Chelsea drop in on Amber Ruffin’s writers’ room, talk with a mother-turned-inventor, and meet a barrier-breaking NYC firefighter.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Take Leaps
episodes.overview: Hillary and Chelsea return to Arkansas to meet with the Little Rock Nine and attend a drag prom with RuPaul’s Drag Race winner Symone.

episodes.name: Gutsy Women Are a Bunch of Mothers
episodes.overview: Hillary and Chelsea get candid about their relationship while taking mother-daughter tango lessons with Goldie Hawn and Kate Hudson.
